articles.title: Florida Lawmakers Renew Push to Launch State Bitcoin Reserve
articles.description: Florida lawmakers introduced another bill for the creation of a strategic Bitcoin reserve, less than a year after two attempts were shelved.

articles.title: Coincheck to acquire digital asset manager 3iQ in $112M stock deal
articles.description: The transaction would give the Japanese exchange operator control of the Canadian asset manager, expanding its presence in regulated investment products.

articles.title: BlackRock adds $900M BTC as Bitcoin long-term selling falls to 2017 lows
articles.description: BlackRock adds $900 million in Bitcoin as long-term holder selling drops to 2017 lows, pointing to early signs of BTC accumulation.

articles.title: Why South Korea is struggling to decide who can issue stablecoins
articles.description: South Korea’s stablecoin rules are stalled as regulators clash over whether banks or fintechs should issue won-backed tokens.

articles.title: Google Just Overhauled Gmail With Gemini 3, Turning It Into an AI Assistant
articles.description: Google integrated Gemini 3 into Gmail, transforming the inbox into an assistant with summaries, drafting tools, and new privacy controls.
